mapper.insert: insert into f_consulting(c_number, c_title, c_content, c_pass, m_id, c_date, c_re_status, c_ref) values(seq_f_c_number.nextval, #{c_title}, #{c_content}, #{c_pass}, #{m_id}, sysdate, 1, seq_f_c_number.CURRVAL)
insert into f_consulting(c_number, c_title, c_content, c_pass, m_id, c_date, c_re_status, c_ref) values(seq_f_c_number.nextval, #{c_title}, #{c_content}, #{c_pass}, #{m_id}, sysdate, 3, #{c_ref})
update f_consulting set c_re_status=2 where c_number=#{c_number}
mapper.update: update f_consulting set c_title=#{c_title}, c_content=#{c_content} where c_number=#{c_number}
update f_consulting set c_re_status=1 where c_ref=#{c_ref}
mapper.select: select * from f_consulting order by c_ref desc, c_re_status asc
select * from f_consulting where c_re_status=2 or c_re_status=3 order by c_ref desc, c_re_status asc
select * from f_consulting where c_re_status=1 order by c_ref desc
select * from f_consulting where c_number=#{c_number} and c_pass=#{c_pass}
select count(*) from f_consulting where c_re_status=1
select count(*) from f_consulting where c_re_status=2 or c_re_status=3
select count(*) from f_consulting where m_id = #{m_id}
